desc: Our Elderberry syrups and gummies are packed with healthy immune boosting benefits, the whole family can enjoy. Made simply from fruit, it's all natural and safe to take every day to help support a healthy immune system.

layout.text: Elderberry relief from colds, the flu and allergies
